    • Uses of PdfPCellEvent in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.events

      Classes in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.events that implement PdfPCellEvent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FieldPositioningEvents
      Class that can be used to position AcroForm fields.
      class  PdfPCellEventForwarder
      If you want to add more than one event to a cell, you have to construct a PdfPCellEventForwarder, add the different events to this object and add the forwarder to the PdfPCell.
      Fields in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.events with type parameters of type PdfPCellEvent 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ArrayList<PdfPCellEvent> PdfPCellEventForwarder.events
      ArrayList containing all the PageEvents that have to be executed.
